name: Google Docs Dark UI - Updated Alternative
description: Edited version of Google Docs Dark UI by Zebouski
additional_info:
Edited version of Google Docs Dark UI by Zebouski

https://userstyles.org/styles/120097/google-docs-dark-ui

I edited it as practice and for convenience since the other one is quite outdated. The page color is by default a dark grey and I haven't found how to allow it to be changed later. Quite a few things I might change later. Hopefully this one is better in the eyes.

Updated Feb 17, 2019

This affects Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides.

Removed the overwrite for the page color for Google Docs. It caused confusion when sharing and using colors. Just change the background color on File> Page Setup

It's still missing colors for pop-up windows and some other things. I will work on that.

discussions.name: You forgot to limit this to docs.
